moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: This move’s power is doubled when the user is poisoned, badly poisoned, paralyzed, or burned. Ignores lowered Attack from burns.

moves.name: Full Heal
moves.effect: Removes all status conditions from an ally.

moves.name: Apply Yourself!
moves.effect: Charges the user’s move gauge by 2 for each allied sync pair on the field. When used in a co-op battle, charges the move gauges of all allied players by 2 instead. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.effect: Has a chance (20%) of lowering the target’s Defense by 1 stat rank.

syncMove.name: Fundamental Takedown
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the user is affected by a status condition.

passives.name: Outrun 4
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge when the user is affected by a status condition.
